item.title: Google Tag Manager Sonar v1.2
item.description: That’s right, I changed the name! Huge thanks to Paul Gailey for the inspiration. Get the latest version of GTM Sonar here. Just a minor update this time. I added some informative text to the pop-up, along with an error screen if something goes wrong. Another change is that now when an element is added to debugDL, a counter on the Browser Action icon will start climbing, representing the number of objects in the array.
